name: Doodle Pairs Free
description:
A classic card game in doodle style! Flip 2 cards and try to match pairs!

The more pairs you can find in series and the faster you are, the more bonus points you gain at the end of the game!
You can also play against a friend in the 2-player mode and compete against him!

Features:
• Doodle Style
• 4 levels of difficulty
• 2 levels also suitable for kids
• Choose between different covers
• Play against a friend in 2-player mode
